message: Let's start fair. Take 10% and I'll keep the rest. We can work out a better deal in the next rounds.
My turn for a starting offer. Let's be realistic, time is money.  65/35 split, take it or let's see where we are next round.
I'm willing to compromise, but I still need a good share. Let's split it 60/40. If you reject this, we'll be losing money fast!
Time is running out, Alice. 55/45 is my final offer.  Take it, or let's risk both losing even more.
